string-array.name: auto_backup_information_condition_phone
string-array.item: Your device is charging or the battery is above %d%

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_condition_tablet
string-array.item: Your tablet is connected to a Wi-Fi network.

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_device_and_os_differences_contents_phone
string-array.item: The data that you can back up may differ based on your phone or operating system.

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_device_and_os_differences_contents_tablet
string-array.item: The data that you can back up may differ based on your tablet or operating system.

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_what_we_cant_backup
string-array.item: Calendar: events and tasks from synced accounts
Galaxy Themes: themes and default wallpaper
Apps: non-compatible installation files and data from non-Samsung apps

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_what_we_cant_backup_basic
string-array.item: Calendar: events and tasks from synced accounts
Galaxy Themes: themes and default wallpaper

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_what_we_cant_backup_premium
string-array.item: "Add data: date that can't be transferred due to the app's policies, chat history of messenger apps(Kakao Talk, WeChat, Whatsapp, etc.)"

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_which_contents
string-array.item: Messages: enhanced messages, multimedia messages, and text messages
Contacts: contacts, email addresses, and business cards saved on your device
Calendar: events and tasks saved on your device
Clock: alarms, world clocks, and timers

"Settings: accessibility settings, ringtones, Samsung Keyboard options, Wi-Fi settings, paired Bluetooth devices, face recognition settings, fingerprint settings, and Always On Display settings (your default ringtone won't be backed up)"
Home screen: layout, wallpapers, and Samsung DeX settings
Apps: installation files and app settings

string-array.name: auto_backup_information_which_contents_premium
string-array.item: Music: MP3, FLAC, WAV, M4A, OGG, and other music files
Documents: PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and other documents
App data: data from non-Samsung apps

string-array.name: temporary_backup_unsupported_data_apps
string-array.item: Data that can’t be transferred due to the app’s policies
"Apps that can't be transferred due to security or compatibility issues: %s"

string-array.name: what_can_i_encrypt_contents
string-array.item: Messages: enhanced messages, multimedia messages, and text messages
Clock: alarms, world clocks, and timers
Settings: accessibility settings, ringtones, Samsung Keyboard options, Wi-Fi settings, paired Bluetooth devices, and Always On Display settings (default ringtone not encrypted)
Home screen: layout, wallpapers, and Samsung DeX settings
